job.command: cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} setenv STARFPE NO set file = $INPUTFILE0; set rung = `echo $file | awk -F\: '{print $2}'` echo "${file}" set logFile = ${file}B.log set filef = ${file}.root set f=`find . -maxdepth 1 -type f -name "${file}*.root"` if ("$f" == "") then root4star -q -b 'bfc.C(20,"HijingAuAu200,'rung.${rung}',MC.y2014,TpcFastSim,-evout,-hitfilt,Alignment,noTags,noRunco,NoHistos,geantout,StiCA,KFVertex","","'${filef}'.root")' >& ${logFile} endif
